SEARCH
Module org.jaspr.hr.demo
Package org.jaspr.hr.demo

Class SqliteQuizDAO

java.lang.Object
org.jaspr.hr.demo.SqliteQuizDAO
public class SqliteQuizDAO extends Object
Class for the Quiz Data Access Object that handles the CRUD operations for the Quiz class with the database.

  • Constructor Summary

      public Question[] getQuestions(int id)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      an array of question objects
